name: Edit Image
semantic_context: Edits an image like blur, resize or adding border and text
natural_language_description: 这是 Edit Image 节点。主要用于: Edits an image like blur, resize or adding border and text

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: border
available_options: Blur (值: blur) - Adds a blur to the image and so makes it less sharp
Border (值: border) - Adds a border to the image
Composite (值: composite) - Composite image on top of another one
Create (值: create) - Create a new image
Get Information (值: information) - Returns image information like resolution
Multi Step (值: multiStep) - Perform multiple operations
Resize (值: resize) - Change the size of image
Shear (值: shear) - Shear image along the X or Y axis
Text (值: text) - Adds text to image
Transparent (值: transparent) - Make a color in image transparent

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property in which the image data can be found
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property in which the image data can be found | 默认值: data

operations.name: operations
operations.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operations | 作用: The operations to perform | 默认值: {}

backgroundColor.name: backgroundColor
backgroundColor.description: The color to use for the background when image gets rotated by anything which is not a multiple of 90
backgroundColor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Background Color | 作用: The color to use for the background when image gets rotated by anything which is not a multiple of 90 | 默认值: #ffffffff

width.name: width
width.natural_language_description: 参数名: Width | 作用: New width of the image | 默认值: 500

height.name: height
height.natural_language_description: 参数名: Height | 作用: New height of the image | 默认值: 500

primitive.name: primitive
primitive.natural_language_description: 参数名: Primitive | 作用: The primitive to draw | 默认值: rectangle

color.name: color
color.natural_language_description: 参数名: Color | 作用: The color to make transparent | 默认值: #ff0000

startPositionX.name: startPositionX
startPositionX.description: X (horizontal) start position of the primitive
startPositionX.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Position X | 作用: X (horizontal) start position of the primitive | 默认值: 50

startPositionY.name: startPositionY
startPositionY.description: Y (horizontal) start position of the primitive
startPositionY.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Position Y | 作用: Y (horizontal) start position of the primitive | 默认值: 50

endPositionX.name: endPositionX
endPositionX.description: X (horizontal) end position of the primitive
endPositionX.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Position X | 作用: X (horizontal) end position of the primitive | 默认值: 250

endPositionY.name: endPositionY
endPositionY.description: Y (horizontal) end position of the primitive
endPositionY.natural_language_description: 参数名: End Position Y | 作用: Y (horizontal) end position of the primitive | 默认值: 250

cornerRadius.name: cornerRadius
cornerRadius.description: The radius of the corner to create round corners
cornerRadius.natural_language_description: 参数名: Corner Radius | 作用: The radius of the corner to create round corners | 默认值: 0

text.name: text
text.description: Text to write on the image
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Text to write on the image

fontSize.name: fontSize
fontSize.natural_language_description: 参数名: Font Size | 作用: Size of the text | 默认值: 18

fontColor.name: fontColor
fontColor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Font Color | 作用: Color of the text | 默认值: #000000

positionX.name: positionX
positionX.natural_language_description: 参数名: Position X | 作用: X (horizontal) position to crop from | 默认值: 0

positionY.name: positionY
positionY.natural_language_description: 参数名: Position Y | 作用: Y (vertical) position to crop from | 默认值: 0

lineLength.name: lineLength
lineLength.description: Max amount of characters in a line before a line-break should get added
lineLength.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Line Length | 作用: Max amount of characters in a line before a line-break should get added | 默认值: 80

blur.name: blur
blur.description: How strong the blur should be
blur.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blur | 作用: How strong the blur should be | 默认值: 5

sigma.name: sigma
sigma.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sigma | 作用: The sigma of the blur | 默认值: 2

borderWidth.name: borderWidth
borderWidth.natural_language_description: 参数名: Border Width | 作用: The width of the border | 默认值: 10

borderHeight.name: borderHeight
borderHeight.natural_language_description: 参数名: Border Height | 作用: The height of the border | 默认值: 10

borderColor.name: borderColor
borderColor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Border Color | 作用: Color of the border | 默认值: #000000

dataPropertyNameComposite.name: dataPropertyNameComposite
dataPropertyNameComposite.description: The name of the binary property which contains the data of the image to composite on top of image which is found in Property Name
dataPropertyNameComposite.natural_language_description: 参数名: Composite Image Property | 作用: The name of the binary property which contains the data of the image to composite on top of image which is found in Property Name

operator.name: operator
operator.description: The operator to use to combine the images
operator.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operator | 作用: The operator to use to combine the images | 默认值: Over

resizeOption.name: resizeOption
resizeOption.natural_language_description: 参数名: Option | 作用: How to resize the image | 默认值: maximumArea
available_options: Ignore Aspect Ratio (值: ignoreAspectRatio) - Ignore aspect ratio and resize exactly to specified values
Maximum Area (值: maximumArea) - Specified values are maximum area
Minimum Area (值: minimumArea) - Specified values are minimum area
Only if Larger (值: onlyIfLarger) - Resize only if image is larger than width or height
Only if Smaller (值: onlyIfSmaller) - Resize only if image is smaller than width or height
Percent (值: percent) - Width and height are specified in percents

rotate.name: rotate
rotate.description: How much the image should be rotated
rotate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Rotate | 作用: How much the image should be rotated | 默认值: 0

degreesX.name: degreesX
degreesX.natural_language_description: 参数名: Degrees X | 作用: X (horizontal) shear degrees | 默认值: 0

degreesY.name: degreesY
degreesY.natural_language_description: 参数名: Degrees Y | 作用: Y (vertical) shear degrees | 默认值: 0

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileName (值: None) - File name to set in binary data
font (值: None) - The font to use. Defaults to Arial. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
format (值: None) - Set the output image format
quality (值: None) - Sets the jpeg|png|tiff compression level from 0 to 100 (best)
